Working with Resource Plans\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The staffing activities (except for \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/PaK5jyR0\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating a Member Position\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") are executed in the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://staffing.epam.com/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"application. \\nFor more information, see the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSTAFPUB/Staffing+Desk+User+Guide\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Staffing Desk User Guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Creating Positions\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For more details on creating positions, please refer to the \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=378242131\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"guide\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you add a new position, the system automatically defaults to a 100% workload for the entire duration of the position. This forces you to clear out bookings for resources that aren't full time. After you have created your positions, choose the positions you would like to clear hours from.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When a suggested person suits the position, you need to Accept the candidate. Otherwise, you should Reject it. While the person is under consideration (interviewing, etc) you can book him for 2 weeks. Booking of candidates is an act of reserving available candidates for a not staffed position. Once booked, an employee cannot be booked for another position within the next 2 weeks. They can be still proposed for another position. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMWPM/Booking+Workflow\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Booking In this case, you should add in UPSA a special \\\"Member\\\" position instead of a regular position. Employees assigned to this position do not have any real workload within a project, but receive read-only access to project materials in the internal tools you use for the
